description:
Ouka is a 2 level adventurer and party leader of the Takemikazuchi familia. Since Takemikazuchi is the god of combat all the members of his familia are experienced in the use of various weapon and hand to hand combat.
Takemikazuchi always put priority in protecting his guild members, In one occassion he performed a pass parade (which means leading a group of agroed monsters to another party to save themselves at the expense of the others) resulting in life/death situation for Bell and his companions. Takemikazuchi was unafraid to express his thought to Bell and his companions that it was the right descision. Late Takemikazuchi made it up to Bell by risking his life to protect him against Goliath.
name: Kashima Ouka
